title: Pset_SensorTypeLightSensor
description: A device that senses or detects light. HISTORY: LightSensorSensorSetPoint changed to SetPointIlluminance. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

SetPointIlluminance.title: SetPointIlluminance
SetPointIlluminance.description: The illuminance value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
